Package Commands

Class MusicLibrary

java.lang.Object
Commands.MusicLibrary
public class MusicLibrary
extends java.lang.Object
This is the receiver class that implements all of the required commands that the user can do as per the system requirements.

    • search

      public java.lang.String search​(java.lang.String[] args) throws java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException, java.lang.InterruptedException, java.io.IOException
      This class handles deciding what strategy it needs to use to handle he request as well as passing that command to the correct strategy
      Parameters:
      args - the values of the request
      Returns:
      String of search results
      Throws:
      java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - Will happen when Firebase Data does no match the request
      java.lang.InterruptedException - This will happen when firebase is terminated while running a request through the Database
      java.io.IOException - thrown when a failure in Input and Output operations
